thread.title: Test captains reject idea of a floodlit finish - Andover Advertiser
thread.title_full: Test captains reject idea of a floodlit finish - Andover Advertiser - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Andover Advertiser
title: Test captains reject idea of a floodlit finish - Andover Advertiser
text:
ICC chief executive Dave Richardson said Test captains had rejected a proposal to play tight matches to a finish under lights The International Cricket Council consulted teams to check if there was a will to circumvent established playing conditions and press on, even in ever worsening light, when a result is imminent. It is a pragmatic solution which would have prevented the scenes in Abu Dhabi at the end of the first Test between England and Pakistan when play was called off with the tourists needing only another 25 runs in eight scheduled overs.
 Andover Advertiser.
